org.svvrl.goal.core.layout
Class ISOMLayout

java.lang.Object
  org.svvrl.goal.core.layout.AbstractLayout
      org.svvrl.goal.core.layout.ISOMLayout
All Implemented Interfaces:
Layout
public class ISOMLayout
extends AbstractLayout

This class provides an implementation of the algorithm in [Bernd Meyer: Self-Organizing Graphs - A Neural Network Perspective of Graph Layout. Graph Drawing 1998: 246-262].

Author:
Ming-Hsien Tsai

Nested Class Summary

Method Detail

layout

public void layout(Graph g,
                   java.awt.Rectangle r,
                   AlgorithmListener l)
Description copied from interface: Layout
Lay out a specified graph by this layout algorithm.

Parameters:
g - a graph to be laid out
r - an area available for the graph g
l - a listener that is interested in the progress of the layout
